note:
Hi :)

I'm Gunnar Grímsson, calling from Iceland, my main activities for the last decades have revolved around making music and being quite active, on- and offline in trying to create a better world.

Working exclusively in IT since '94, designing; websites, UX/UI, processes and democratic systems, CEO and co-founder of Citizens Foundation from 2008-2017.

I'm also a dancer, fantasy/sci-fi geek and a firm believer in 80/20. I mostly drink white tea and bubbly. And do various other things :)
